name: dflex-monorepo
description: DFlex is a Javascript library for modern Drag and Drop apps.
author: Jalal Maskoun

scripts.start:cy: start-server-and-test start:dnd http-get://localhost:3001 'cypress open --env extended=true --project playgrounds/dflex-dnd-playground'
scripts.cy:run:vertical:chrome: cypress run --env extended=true --project playgrounds/dflex-dnd-playground --headless --spec 'playgrounds/dflex-dnd-playground/cypress/e2e/same-container-vertical/**/*.cy.ts' --config-file cypress.config.ts --browser chrome
scripts.test-e2e-ci:chromium: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=dflex-dnd start-server-and-test serve:dnd http-get://localhost:3001 test-e2e:chromium
scripts.test-e2e-ci:firefox: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=dflex-dnd start-server-and-test serve:dnd http-get://localhost:3001 test-e2e:firefox
scripts.test-e2e-ci:webkit: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=dflex-dnd start-server-and-test serve:dnd http-get://localhost:3001 test-e2e:webkit
scripts.test-e2e-ci-draggable:chromium: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=dflex-draggable start-server-and-test serve:draggable http-get://localhost:3000 test-e2e:chromium
scripts.test-e2e-ci-draggable:firefox: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=dflex-draggable start-server-and-test serve:draggable http-get://localhost:3000 test-e2e:firefox
scripts.test-e2e-ci-draggable:webkit: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=dflex-draggable start-server-and-test serve:draggable http-get://localhost:3000 test-e2e:webkit
scripts.test-e2e-next:chromium: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=next-dnd start-server-and-test start:next http-get://localhost:3002 test-e2e:chromium
scripts.test-e2e-next:firefox: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=next-dnd start-server-and-test start:next http-get://localhost:3002 test-e2e:firefox
scripts.test-e2e-next:webkit: cross-env PLAYGROUND_TYPE=next-dnd start-server-and-test start:next http-get://localhost:3002 test-e2e:webkit
scripts.build-prod: pnpm clean && pnpm bundle-types && pnpm run build --production --release --minify
